roller coaster.translation[0].definition: a track with very steep slopes and curves, which people ride on in small carriages at fairs and amusement parks
Their relationship was an emotional roller coaster.
roller coaster.translation[1].definition: when there are large up and down movements in the prices of shares, currencies etc within a short period of time
After a roller-coaster day, the dollar was down against the pound but up moderately against the yen.
